user_query: What's the terminal voltage right now?
details: Testing colloquial language: 'actual...right now' should match readback value, not setpoint

user_query: Show me all the horizontal beam steering setpoints at the accelerating tube
details: Testing understanding of: beam steering = steering coil, horizontal = X direction, accelerating tube location, and setpoint vs readback

user_query: What are the vacuum levels in beamline 1?
details: Testing synonym matching: 'vacuum levels' should match 'Pressure' readings. Also tests location understanding.

user_query: Give me the HFEL beamline vacuum readings
details: Testing location-based filtering (bline_hfel) and synonym matching (vacuum readings = pressure)

user_query: What are the focusing element voltages in both tubes?
details: Testing understanding of: focusing elements = solenoids, both tubes = accelerating + decelerating tubes. May return both set and readback.

user_query: Check the electron gun filament current RBV
details: Testing whether system understands 'check RBV' implies readback value

user_query: What's the beam pulse width setting?
details: Testing synonym: 'pulse width' = 'pulse duration', and understanding that 'setting' implies a control value

user_query: Show me all vertical steering coils in the decelerating tube
details: Testing understanding: vertical = Y direction, steering corrections = steering coil, decelerating tube location

user_query: What's the setpoint for dipole magnet 5?
details: Testing template instance recognition: specific numbered device from template with specific sub-channel

user_query: Give me quadrupole magnet 3 readback
details: Testing template instance recognition with readback specification

user_query: Show me all quadrupole magnet 10 values
details: Testing template instance query without specifying set/readback - should return both

user_query: What are the first three dipole magnet setpoints?
details: Testing range query understanding for template instances

user_query: Give me steering coil 7 horizontal setpoint
details: Testing axis-specific query: horizontal = X axis, with both instance number and sub-channel type

user_query: What's the vertical readback for steering coil 12?
details: Testing axis-specific query: vertical = Y axis, with readback specification

user_query: Show me all steering coil 15 values
details: Testing multi-axis aggregate: should return both X and Y, both Set and ReadBack for specified instance

user_query: Give me the image from observation screen 8
details: Testing image data PV recognition from template instance

user_query: What is the current position readback of observation screen 14?
details: Testing specific readback query - explicit request for position readback only

user_query: Give me the motor control channels for observation screens 1 through 4
details: Testing range query for motor control channels - explicit request for control, not readback

user_query: What's the beam current waveform at monitor 2?
details: Testing waveform data recognition from current monitor template

user_query: Show me all current monitor readings
details: Testing aggregate query across all instances of a template type

user_query: What are the last two dipole magnet readbacks?
details: Testing edge case: understanding 'last two' means highest numbered instances (8 and 9, since dipoles go 1-9)

user_query: Give me quadrupole magnets 15 through 17
details: Testing explicit range query with boundary at maximum instance (17 is last quadrupole)

user_query: What's the pressure in all FEL beamlines?
details: Testing aggregate location query: 'all FEL beamlines' = HFEL, FIR, and MM beamlines

user_query: Show me the electron gun diagnostics
details: Testing semantic grouping: 'electron gun diagnostics' should include all gun-related measurements

user_query: What are the grading resistor currents?
details: Testing understanding of technical component groups: both tubes' grading resistors

user_query: Give me the corona triode measurement values
details: Testing component-based grouping: corona triode measurement values (excludes needle controls)

user_query: What's the charging system status reading right now?
details: Testing system-level query: pelletron charging system includes both terminal and bottom tank parameters

user_query: Show me terminal power and cooling
details: Testing functional grouping: power and cooling systems in terminal

user_query: What's the X-ray beamline pressure?
details: Testing specific beamline location recognition (xray beamline)

user_query: Give me all the steering coils inside the tank
details: Testing location-based aggregate for non-template channels: all steering coils inside the tank (both accelerating and decelerating tubes)
